experiences.title: Full Stack Developer (Internship)
points: Process automation in Google Sheets using Google Apps Script.
Creation of interactive buttons in spreadsheets that executed scripts connected to external APIs.
Data validation and testing with Postman to ensure correct integration with Pipedrive (sales CRM and management software).
Improved efficiency in data management and internal company workflows.

experiences.title: Co-Founder & Full Stack Developer
points: Founded a digital agency during the Henry bootcamp with two partners.
Developed web projects for clients using React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and PostgreSQL.
Designed and implemented custom solutions, from architecture to user interface.

experiences.title: Freelance AI Trainer
points: Training and supervision of artificial intelligence models on the Outlier AI platform.
Contributed to algorithm improvement through quality data generation and structured feedback.

projects.introduction: What I have done so far

projects.name: Chef Experience Portfolio
projects.description: Interactive portfolio for chefs, developed with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, and internationalization (i18n) in English and Spanish. Features a dish carousel, animations, hamburger menu, and responsive design.

experienceSection.introduction: What I have done so far

hero.name: Nahuel Carvajal
hero.description: I'm a full stack developer passionate about creating efficient and attractive web solutions.

about.description: I'm a Full Stack Developer with strong experience in TypeScript and JavaScript. I build responsive and user-friendly interfaces using React.js and Next.js, and develop robust backend APIs with Node.js, Express, and NestJS. I work efficiently with relational databases like MySQL and PostgreSQL, and also leverage Firebase for authentication and real-time data. Passionate about creating scalable, maintainable, and intuitive web solutions, I enjoy turning ideas into functional applications.

works.description: 'These projects represent a selection of my work and demonstrate how I apply my skills in real-world cases. Each one includes a short description, as well as links to the code and live demo. Through them, I showcase my ability to solve issues, adapt to different technologies, and carry projects forward efficiently.
